sentences.en: According to our records your complaint about an incomplete delivery is unfounded.
sentences.cn: 根据我们的记录,贵公司有关货数量不足所作的抱怨是无根据的.

sentences.en: Her trust in him was unfounded.
sentences.cn: 她对他的信任毫无道理。
他的恐惧被证实为无根据的.

sentences.en: I'm pleased to that our fears about the weather proved unfounded.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴地发现我们对天气的担心是毫无理由的.

sentences.en: Such unfounded opinions do not bear argument; the truth speaks for itself.
sentences.cn: 对此论调,无需争辩, 事实是最好的回答.

sentences.en: The assumption that robots will make humans redundant and replaceable is unfounded.
sentences.cn: 认为机器人将人类变得多余和可替代的假设是站不住脚的.

sentences.en: The worry of the Chinese community is not unfounded.
sentences.cn: 华社对这样的现象忧心忡忡是可以理解的.

sentences.en: There were unfounded rumours of alcohol abuse.
sentences.cn: 一些毫无根据的酗酒谣言在流传。

sentences.en: These claims have been disputed and would seem unfounded.
sentences.cn: 这些声称都被争议并看似?有理由的..

sentences.en: They have been reluctant to admit AIDS patients, in part because of unfounded fears of contagion.
sentences.cn: 他们一直不愿接纳艾滋病患者，部分原因是无来由地害怕被接触传染。
这种说法完全是无稽之谈.

sentences.en: Unfounded rumours of accounting problems hit stocks of other companies.
sentences.cn: 有关账目问题的无根据的谣言打击了其他公司的股票。

sentences.en: We hold that their proposal is unfounded.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他们的建议是无事实根据的.

sentences.en: Your report last week was unfair. It was based upon wholly unfounded and totally unjustified allegations.
sentences.cn: 你上周的报告是不公平的。它是基于毫无根据且完全无端的指控。

words.tran_cn: 未建立的；没有理由的；没有事实根据的

trans.tran_cn: 无事实根据的，无基础的，未建立的，未确定的
trans.tran_en: unfounded statements, feelings, opinions etc are wrong because they are not based on facts
